findings.title: Unrestricted Token Transfer Despite Sender's Limited Transmission
findings.description: _MainToken#transferFrom() function allows token transfer even when _from argument's transmission is limited due to onlyUnlocked modifier checking msg.sender's lock status instead of sender.

findings.title: TIPS : 누락된 Event 가 있습니다
findings.description: In functions mint and linearMint of contracts MainToken and LinearMintableToken respectively, Transfer events are omitted, making it difficult to track changes in real-time.
